entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or thunderstorms. High 17 except 11 near Lake Ontario.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High 17 except 11 near Lake Ontario. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
